en: Peppa and George are playing in Mummy and Daddy's bedroom.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在妈妈和爸爸的卧室里玩。

en: What's this?
Peppa has found a box of old clothes.
zh: 佩奇找到了一箱旧衣服。

en: Wow! This is Daddy's hat.
And this is Mummy's dress.
George! Let's dress up and pretend to be Mummy and Daddy.
zh: 乔治！让我们装扮成妈妈和爸爸。

en: Here is Daddy's hat.
And here is Daddy's coat.
Hello, Daddy Pig.
Now it's my turn.This is Mummy's dress.
zh: 现在轮到我了。这是妈妈的裙子。

en: This is Mummy's hat.
Daddy Pig! Where are your shoes?
I need some shoes, too.
Now I need to look beautiful, just like Mummy.
zh: 现在，我需要看上去像妈妈一样漂亮。

en: Peppa has found Mummy's make-up box.
zh: 佩奇找到了妈妈的化妆盒。

en: Aha!
First, some powder.
Lovely! Now for some lipstick.
zh: 非常好看！现在涂些口红。

en: What a pretty Mummy Pig!
Come along, Daddy Pig.It's time to go to work.
zh: 来吧，猪爸爸。是时候去工作了。

en: Mummy is working on her computer.
Hello, Peppa. Hello, George.
I beg your pardon?
Peppa, I was just saying ''hello''.
I'm not Peppa Pig. I'm Mummy Pig.
zh: 我不是佩奇。我是猪妈妈。

en: Oh, yes! Of course. Hello, Mummy Pig.
zh: 哦，是的！的确这样，你好，猪妈妈。

en: Hello, and this is Daddy Pig.
And hello to you, too, Daddy Pig.
Excuse me，I've got a lot of work to do!
zh: 不好意思，我有很多的工作要做！

en: Hello? Yes, do this, do that.
No, thank you, goodbye.
Peppa is enjoying pretending to be Mummy Pig.
zh: 佩奇很享受扮演成猪妈妈。

en: But George is getting a bit bored.
zh: 但是乔治开始觉得有点无聊了。

en: Sorry, Daddy Pig, I'm nearly finished.
zh: 对不起，猪爸爸，我快完成了。

en: There! All done!
Come on, Daddy Pig, it's time you did some work.
zh: 来吧，猪爸爸，是时候该你干活了。

en: Goodbye, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.
Goodbye.
Daddy Pig is digging in the garden.
Hello, Peppa. Hello, George.
I'm not Peppa! I'm Mummy Pig and this is Daddy Pig!
zh: 我不是佩奇！我是猪妈妈，而这是猪爸爸！

en: Daddy pig is here to do some work.
zh: 猪爸爸是来这里干活的。

en: That's very kind of you, Daddy Pig.
Now, be careful, it's a very deep hole.
zh: 现在，要小心哦，它是一个很深的坑。

en: I do hope you are not digging in your best clothes, Daddy Pig.
zh: 我真希望你没把土掺进你最好的衣服里，猪爸爸。

en: I want to make big snorts, too.
zh: 我也想发出这么响的鼻鼾声。

en: Ice cream, everyone.
Ice cream!
Peppa! George!
You must take off those muddy clothes before you eat.
zh: 在吃之前，你们必须脱掉身上的脏衣服。

en: I'm Mummy Pig and this is Daddy Pig.
zh: 我是猪妈妈，而这是猪爸爸。

en: Are you sure?
Yes.
So, where are Peppa and George?
zh: 那么，佩奇和乔治去哪了？

en: We don't know.
Oh, well, that's a shame because I've got their favorite ice cream here.
zh: 哦，好吧，真可惜了我还准备了他们最喜欢的雪糕。

en: But if we can't find them,then...
zh: 但是如果我们找不到他们，那么。。。

en: Here we are!
Peppa! George! There you are!
Yes, Mummy, we were just pretending to be you and Daddy.
zh: 是的，妈妈，我们刚才假扮成你和爸爸。

en: You really had us fooled!
